thread.title: Media Matters for America Founder David Brock Has Suffered a Heart Attack
thread.title_full: Media Matters for America Founder David Brock Has Suffered a Heart Attack

author: Ken Meyer
title: Media Matters for America Founder David Brock Has Suffered a Heart Attack
text:
Media Matters for America Founder David Brock Has Suffered a Heart Attack by Ken Meyer | 2:45   
Media Matters for America founder, David Brock, suffered a major heart attack yesterday. 
The new was put out in a statement by Brock’s chief of staff, Bradley Beychok , who also described the liberal media operative’s condition: David Brock suffered a heart attack yesterday afternoon pic.twitter.com/7Ntm4BDd7v 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) March 22, 2017 
[image via screengrab]
